title: Trump ventures deeper into anti-immigrant language by calling people from Somalia ‘garbage’
description: Critics argue that Trump’s language legitimizes xenophobia and has a significant impact on public perception.
content:
By LAURIE KELLMAN
He said it four times in seven seconds: Somali immigrants in the United States are garbage.
It was no mistake. In fact, President Donald Trumps rhetorical attacks on immigrants ha… [+7793 chars]
